JobFullDesc: Would you be passionate about guiding, leading and successfully transitioning our customers and partners to Microsoft 365?  Microsoft 365 FastTrack team is looking for a thoughtful, analytical, independent thinker and high energy Program Manager to own and drive new approaches and solutions in Microsoft 365 onboarding and adoption experience.  As a Program Manager, you will own and drive business analytics and data insights to speed customer onboarding experience, drive adoption and help users get the most from the cloud productivity suite. The person will collaborate with business stakeholders to gather reporting requirements, consult on effective performance measurements, and develop necessary reporting dashboards that executes against strategic business plans. Microsoft 365 continues to experience incredible growth as the company focuses on its productivity cloud strategy and enabling secure remote work for its customers. As part of Microsoft Engineering, The FastTrack team has a primary role in driving this strategy and is looking for individuals that share in the passion to drive business value and customer success
